bug.author: zrss
bug.summary: Alluxio tag 2.0.0 can not be built
bug.description: Alluxio Version: What version of Alluxio are you using? tag v2.0.0 Describe the bug A clear and concise description of what the bug is. run the building command mvn -T 2C clean install -DskipTests -Dmaven.javadoc.skip -Dfindbugs.skip -Dcheckstyle.skip -Dlicense.skip <denchmark-code>[ERROR] Failed to execute goal on project alluxio-core-server-common: Could not resolve dependencies for project org.alluxio:alluxio-core-server-common:jar:2.0.0: The following artifacts could not be resolved: io.atomix.copycat.alluxio:copycat-server:jar:1.2.12, io.atomix.copycat.alluxio:copycat-client:jar:1.2.12: Failure to find io.atomix.copycat.alluxio:copycat-server:jar:1.2.12 in http://uk.maven.org/maven2 was cached in the local repository, resolution will not be reattempted until the update interval of UK has elapsed or updates are forced -> [Help 1] </denchmark-code>

comments.comment:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/Alluxio/alluxio/issues/8868>#8868</denchmark-link>
pay attention to remove the mirror confs in your mvn setting (setting.xml), it seems to overide the repository conf in the alluxio pom.xml

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/Alluxio/alluxio/issues/9416>#9416</denchmark-link> fix <denchmark-code>./dev/scripts/generate-tarballs single -target alluxio-\2.0.0.tar.gz -debug </denchmark-code>
and could we provide a more detail doc about generate-tarball

has <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Alluxio/alluxio/pull/9428>#9428</denchmark-link> fixed your issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/zrss>@zrss</denchmark-link> ? regarding the request on documentation, I updated <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Alluxio/alluxio/issues/9559>#9559</denchmark-link> on
thx apc999, <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Alluxio/alluxio/pull/9428>#9428</denchmark-link> has fixed my problem. and currently, we lack of the doc of (i get it in buiding docker shell ...)

thanks for the response. As mentioned I've updated <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Alluxio/alluxio/issues/9559>#9559</denchmark-link> to add a task about adding more documentation on generate-tarballs. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Alluxio/alluxio/issues/9559>#9559</denchmark-link> serves as a running issue for all documentation defects (in your case the lack of description on generate-tarballs). Close your issue now.
